page.title: 19The Buildings of Nantwich.
page.content: Nantwich is a town which contains many interesting properties, the majority of which are rooted in the town's historic past.{Churche's {Mansion}is a restaurant today but is also open as a museum.The tilted black and white walls and low ceilings of the{Crown Hotel}attract many locals and visitors for food,drink or a bed. There are excellent examples of many different periods and styles of architecture including Tudor,Georgian, and Edwardian.The names of the streets such as{Oat Market,Swine Market and {Castle St,}and public houses including the Boot and Shoe,the Wilbraham Arms, the Cheshire Cheese to name but a few reflect the community, past and present.In recent years the town has become well-known in Cheshire for its nightclubs,{the Cheshire Cat}in Welsh Row being the most famous.
